content.question: Which of the following actions is most likely to improve the system reliability of a Java program?

choices.label: Designing the program to minimize the use of procedural abstraction
Testing the program with conditions that represent a wide variety of ways the program will be used
Using default constructors to set the initial state of the objects used in the program
Using public visibility for the attributes and behaviors of the classes used in the program

content.answer: Testing the program with conditions that represent a wide variety of ways the program will be used
